response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its exceptional features and capabilities, it's truly a game-changer in its field. Given its value to you, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both parties. My proposal is to offer this remarkable product to you for $9,500. This price reflects the high quality and utility of the product while allowing us to maintain a fair profit margin. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 9500}
